name: Hector's Capture The Flag
description:
Hello, meet Hector! Hector is a fun tubby little guy who enjoys sports and competition. Join him today in Hector's Capture The Flag, a 5v5 singleplayer game based off the popular outdoor sport everyone played growing up! Race to compete and score for your team. Points are scored by grabbing the enemy's flag back to your side. First team to reach 5 points wins! Be careful, crossing the midline leaves you vulnerable to the enemy catching you and sending you to their jail. Remember to have fun out there, entertain the crowd, and smile, you're on camera!

Version 1.0.0 ALPHA + Changelog :

- Not currently Available

Controls + How to Play :

- WASD : Movement

- To Score Points:

   Grab the enemy's flag by crossing the midline. To score, you must return back to your side holding the flag without getting tagged by enemy Hectors. Avoid getting tagged by enemies.

- To Place Enemies in Jail:

   Run up to enemies if they are in your zone. If you are close enough, the enemy Hector will teleport to your side's jail.

- To break out of Jail: 

   If you end up in jail, wait for one of your teammates to save you. To save your teammates from jail, press the "Push for Jailbreak" button by running up to the podium in front of the jail.

- Important!!!

   If your entire team ends up in jail, you will all be sent back to your side. However, your team will automatically be deducted one point (if your team has a score of at least 1).

Features to be added :

- Multiplayer

- Night mode

- Victory animations

- Juking

- Sprinting
